mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS stat_day, (CASE WHEN AMOUNT BETWEEN 0 AND 100000 THEN '1' WHEN AMOUNT BETWEEN 100000 AND 200000 THEN '2' WHEN AMOUNT BETWEEN 200000 AND 300000 THEN '3' WHEN AMOUNT BETWEEN 300000 AND 400000 THEN '4' WHEN AMOUNT BETWEEN 400000 AND 500000 THEN '5' ELSE 'O' END) AS a_stat, COUNT(DISTINCT CTN) AS b_stat, COUNT(*) AS c_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN API_TYPE = #{charge} THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS d_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN API_TYPE = #{refund} OR API_TYPE = #{reversal} THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS e_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN API_TYPE = #{charge} THEN AMOUNT WHEN API_TYPE = #{refund} OR API_TYPE = #{reversal} THEN -AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS f_stat, (CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CTN) > 0 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN API_TYPE = #{charge} THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(DISTINCT CTN) ELSE 0 END) AS g_stat FROM TB_API_LOGS WHERE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), CASE WHEN AMOUNT BETWEEN 0 AND 100000 THEN '1' WHEN AMOUNT BETWEEN 100000 AND 200000 THEN '2' WHEN AMOUNT BETWEEN 200000 AND 300000 THEN '3' WHEN AMOUNT BETWEEN 300000 AND 400000 THEN '4' WHEN AMOUNT BETWEEN 400000 AND 500000 THEN '5' ELSE 'O' END
